data.message: THIS SUCKS. EMINEM WAS HIS BEST 1996-2004. HES OLD AS ROTTEN DOG SHIT. HE GOTTA HANG IT UP. YOU TOO OLD EM. RIP SLIM SHADY AND EMINEM AND "MARSHAL MATHERS"

Quit being so analytical like everyone single one of you invented music just enjoy it and if you don't like it say so but don't diss someone else for their taste. Sorry for the rant.
